blocks.name: elimhyps
blocks.content: A version of ~ elimhyp using explicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: dedths
blocks.content: A version of weak deduction theorem ~ dedth using explicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dedths(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wsbc(s0, cif(cv(s0), c0, w0), w1)
} = {
  3imtr3i(w0, w1, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0), wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w1))
  dedth(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0), wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w1), wsbc(s0, cif(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0)), w1))
  dfsbcq(s0, cv(s0), cif(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0)), w1)
  mpbir(wsbc(s0, cif(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0)), w1), wsbc(s0, cif(cv(s0), c0, w0), w1))
  mp2b(wb(wsbc(s0, cif(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0)), w1), wsbc(s0, cif(cv(s0), c0, w0), w1)), wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0), w0), wceq(cif(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0)), cif(cv(s0), c0, w0)))
  ifbi(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0), w0)
  dfsbcq(s0, cif(cv(s0), c0, wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0)), cif(cv(s0), c0, w0), w1)
  sbcid(s0, w0)
  sbcid(s0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dedths(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ w1)
  âŠ£ [if(w0, s0, c0)/ s0]w1
} = {
  3imtr3i(w0, w1, [s0 / s0]w0, [s0 / s0]w1)
  dedth(s0, c0, [s0 / s0]w0, [s0 / s0]w1, [if([s0 / s0]w0, s0, c0)/ s0]w1)
  dfsbcq(s0, s0, if([s0 / s0]w0, s0, c0), w1)
  mpbir([if([s0 / s0]w0, s0, c0)/ s0]w1, [if(w0, s0, c0)/ s0]w1)
  mp2b(([if([s0 / s0]w0, s0, c0)/ s0]w1 â†”[if(w0, s0, c0)/ s0]w1), ([s0 / s0]w0 â†” w0), if([s0 / s0]w0, s0, c0)= if(w0, s0, c0))
  ifbi(s0, c0, [s0 / s0]w0, w0)
  dfsbcq(s0, if([s0 / s0]w0, s0, c0), if(w0, s0, c0), w1)
  sbcid(s0, w0)
  sbcid(s0, w1)
}

blocks.name: renegclALT
blocks.content: Closure law for negative of reals. Demonstrates use of weak deduction theorem with explicit substitution. The proof is much longer than that of ~ renegcl . (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm renegclALT(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
} = {
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, cr, wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr))
  eleq1d(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr, cneg(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  negeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  dedths(hs0, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr))
  mpbir(wsbc(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr)), wcel(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cneg(cv(hs0))), cr))
  eqeltri(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cneg(cv(hs0))), cr, cneg(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cv(hs0))))
  ax-mp(wceq(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cneg(cv(hs0))), cneg(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), universe))
  csbnegg(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), universe, cv(hs0))
  renegcli(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cv(hs0)))
  mpbi(wcel(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cv(hs0)), cr), wsbc(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  elimhyps(hs0, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  mpbir(wsbc(hs0, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(csb(hs0, nat0, cv(hs0)), cr))
  eqeltri(csb(hs0, nat0, cv(hs0)), cr, nat0)
  ax-mp(wceq(csb(hs0, nat0, cv(hs0)), nat0), wcel(nat0, universe))
  csbvarg(hs0, nat0, universe)
  0re()
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(hs0, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(csb(hs0, nat0, cv(hs0)), cr)), wcel(nat0, universe))
  sbcel1g(hs0, nat0, universe, cv(hs0), cr)
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cv(hs0)), cr)), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), universe))
  sbcel1g(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), universe, cv(hs0), cr)
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr)), wcel(csb(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), cneg(cv(hs0))), cr)), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), universe))
  ifex(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  vex(hs0)
  c0ex()
  sbcel1g(hs0, cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), universe, cneg(cv(hs0)), cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm renegclALT(class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ â„ â†’ -u(c0)âˆˆ â„)
} = {
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, cr, -u(c0)âˆˆ â„, -u(hs0)âˆˆ â„)
  eleq1d(-u(hs0), cr, -u(c0), hs0 = c0)
  negeq(hs0, c0)
  dedths(hs0, nat0, hs0 âˆˆ â„, -u(hs0)âˆˆ â„)
  mpbir([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]-u(hs0)âˆˆ â„, [if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]-u(hs0)âˆˆ â„)
  eqeltri([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]-u(hs0), cr, -u([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]hs0))
  ax-mp([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]-u(hs0)= -u([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]hs0), if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)âˆˆ ð•Œ)
  csbnegg(hs0, if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0), universe, hs0)
  renegcli([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]hs0)
  mpbi([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„, [if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„)
  elimhyps(hs0, nat0, hs0 âˆˆ â„)
  mpbir([0 / hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„, [0 / hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„)
  eqeltri([0 / hs0]hs0, cr, nat0)
  ax-mp([0 / hs0]hs0 = 0, 0 âˆˆ ð•Œ)
  csbvarg(hs0, nat0, universe)
  0re()
  ax-mp(([0 / hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„ â†”[0 / hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„), 0 âˆˆ ð•Œ)
  sbcel1g(hs0, nat0, universe, hs0, cr)
  ax-mp(([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„ â†”[if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]hs0 âˆˆ â„), if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)âˆˆ ð•Œ)
  sbcel1g(hs0, if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0), universe, hs0, cr)
  ax-mp(([if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]-u(hs0)âˆˆ â„ â†”[if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)/ hs0]-u(hs0)âˆˆ â„), if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0)âˆˆ ð•Œ)
  ifex(hs0, nat0, hs0 âˆˆ â„)
  vex(hs0)
  c0ex()
  sbcel1g(hs0, if(hs0 âˆˆ â„, hs0, 0), universe, -u(hs0), cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(-u(c0)âˆˆ â„)
}

blocks.name: elimhyps2
blocks.content: Generalization of ~ elimhyps that is not useful unless we can separately prove ` |- A e. _V ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: dedths2
blocks.content: Generalization of ~ dedths that is not useful unless we can separately prove ` |- A e. _V ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: nfcxfrdf
blocks.content: A utility lemma to transfer a bound-variable hypothesis builder into a definition. (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: nfded
blocks.content: A deduction theorem that converts a not-free inference directly to deduction form. The first hypothesis is the hypothesis of the deduction form. The second is an equality deduction (e.g., ` ( F/_ x A -> U. { y | A. x y e. A } = U. A ) ` ) that starts from ~ abidnf . The last is assigned to the inference form (e.g., ` F/_ x U. { y | A. x y e. A } ` ) whose hypothesis is satisfied using ~ nfaba1 . (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: nfded2
blocks.content: A deduction theorem that converts a not-free inference directly to deduction form. The first 2 hypotheses are the hypotheses of the deduction form. The third is an equality deduction (e.g., ` ( ( F/_ x A /\ F/_ x B ) ` ` -> <. { y | A. x y e. A } , { y | A. x y e. B } >. = <. A , B >. ) ` for ~ nfopd ) that starts from ~ abidnf . The last is assigned to the inference form (e.g., ` F/_ x <. { y | A. x y e. A } , { y | A. x y e. B } >. ` for ~ nfop ) whose hypotheses are satisfied using ~ nfaba1 . (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfded2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(wnfc(s0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2)), wceq(c3, c0))
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpbii(w0, wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, c3), wnfc(s0, c0)), wnfc(s0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2))
  nfceqdf(s0, c3, c0, wa(wnfc(s0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2)))
  nfan(s0, wnfc(s0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2))
  nfnfc1(s0, c1)
  nfnfc1(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfded2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c0))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c1))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c2))
  âŠ£ ((F/(s0, c1)âˆ§ F/(s0, c2))â†’ c3 = c0)
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpbii(w0, F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c3))
  syl2anc(w0, (F/(s0, c3)â†” F/(s0, c0)), F/(s0, c1), F/(s0, c2))
  nfceqdf(s0, c3, c0, (F/(s0, c1)âˆ§ F/(s0, c2)))
  nfan(s0, F/(s0, c1), F/(s0, c2))
  nfnfc1(s0, c1)
  nfnfc1(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: nfunidALT2
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ nfuni . (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfunidALT2(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cuni(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
} = {
  mpbii(w0, wnfc(s0, cuni(c0)), wnfc(s0, cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))))
  nfuni(s0, cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))), wnfc(s0, cuni(c0))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  nfceqdf(s0, cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))), cuni(c0), wnfc(s0, c0))
  nfnfc1(s0, c0)
  unieqd(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), c0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfunidALT2(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, â‹ƒ c0))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c0))
} = {
  mpbii(w0, F/(s0, â‹ƒ c0), F/(s0, â‹ƒ { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)}))
  nfuni(s0, { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)})
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  syl(w0, (F/(s0, â‹ƒ { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)})â†” F/(s0, â‹ƒ c0)), F/(s0, c0))
  nfceqdf(s0, â‹ƒ { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)}, â‹ƒ c0, F/(s0, c0))
  nfnfc1(s0, c0)
  unieqd({ hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)}, c0, F/(s0, c0))
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: nfunidALT
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ nfuni . (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nfopdALT
blocks.content: Deduction version of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ nfop . This shows how the deduction version of a not-free theorem such as ~ nfop can be created from the corresponding not-free inference theorem. (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfopdALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cop(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfded2(s0, cop(c0, c1), c0, c1, cop(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), w0)
  opeq12d(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), c0, c1, wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))
  adantr(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1), wceq(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), c0))
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c0)
  adantl(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1), wceq(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), c1))
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfop(s0, cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfopdALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, < c0, c1 >))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c0))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ F/(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfded2(s0, < c0, c1 >, c0, c1, < { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)}, { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)} >, w0)
  opeq12d({ hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)}, { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)}, c0, c1, (F/(s0, c0)âˆ§ F/(s0, c1)))
  adantr(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1), { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)} = c0)
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c0)
  adantl(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1), { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)} = c1)
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfop(s0, { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)}, { hs0 | âˆ€(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)})
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
